Research Publication

Research on Machine Learning in Healthcare

A comprehensive research publication exploring the applications of machine learning algorithms in healthcare diagnostics and patient outcome prediction.

Technologies Used
  • Python
  • TensorFlow
  • Scikit-learn
  • Pandas
  • Jupyter
Live Demo View Code
Jump to Section

Abstract

This publication presents a comprehensive analysis of machine learning applications in healthcare, with a focus on diagnostic accuracy and patient outcome prediction.

Key Findings

  • ML models achieved 94% accuracy in early disease detection
  • Significant reduction in false positives compared to traditional methods
  • Proposed framework for integrating ML into clinical workflows
